name: Lazer Defender 3.0
description:
This game is a prototype and portfolio.

You have finally arrived at planet X-delta. But,  it was a setup by Republic of Ozamba. Fight with Admiral Snackbar to escape from the planet!

How to play:

  1. Press W,A,S,D to move the aircraft.
  2. Press Space to Shoot.
  3. Avoid and Shoot all enemies.
  4. Have fun and score as best as you can  !

All Assets are free and taken from the internet. 

A 3D game made by me.
